Suppressor.jl

    Docstrings
    Suppressor.@capture_err — Macro.
    @capture_err expr

    Capture the stderr stream for the given expression.

    Suppressor.@capture_out — Macro.
    @capture_out expr

    Capture the stdout stream for the given expression.

    Suppressor.@color_output — Macro.
    @color_output enabled::Bool expr

    Enable or disable color printing for the given expression. Often useful in combination with the @capture_* macros:

    Example

    @coloroutput false begin output = @captureerr begin @warn "should get captured, not printed" end end @test output == "WARNING: should get captured, not printed "

    Suppressor.@suppress — Macro.
    @suppress expr

    Suppress the stdout and stderr streams for the given expression.

    Suppressor.@suppress_err — Macro.
    @suppress_err expr

    Suppress the stderr stream for the given expression.

    Suppressor.@suppress_out — Macro.
    @suppress_out expr

    Suppress the stdout stream for the given expression.
